biography.headline: Short Biography

paragraphs.001: A coder and designer with over a year of professional experience in front-end web development. Experience in building web applications, from developing interfaces to integrating data and services. My expertise is currently somewhere in the realm of JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Redux, Zustand, Tailwind and Chakra UI.
paragraphs.002: Despite still being early on my career, I've been fortunate enough to have given opportunities to contribute to various projects in the industry. Most recently I've worked at Seaplane Group, a Hong Kong-based startup company, where I've took ownership of the maintenance and development of user-facing features for two company projects. Prior to joining Seaplane Group, I've worked at Highly Succeed Inc., a Philippine-based company offering a diverse range of IT services. During my tenure, I've had the opportunity to co-develop web applications for our private and government clients.
paragraphs.003: As a lifelong learner, I'm passionate and dedicated to continuous learning. To stay at the forefront of the ever-evolving tech landscape, I spend significant time and effort to investing in my personal growth and development. In these past few days, I've been broadening my existing skill set and expertise into adjacent domains, encompassing user experience, backend development, and the intricacies of devops.
paragraphs.004: To maintain a work-life balance, you'll often find me engaged in spending quality time with my loyal German Shepherd, Comet, forging a bond while honing our skills together. When not in training mode, my other canine companions, Brew and Latte, eargerly join the mix, creating a playful and vibrant atmosphere. In addition, I occasionally indulge in watching TV series such as SEAL Team, The Big Bang Theory, Suits, etc.. I'm also an enthusiastic gamer with a particular fondness for real-time strategy, single-player campaigns with compelling narratives, and tactical shooter games.
paragraphs.005: Currently, I'm actively seeking new opportunities in the field of front-end development and enthusiastically open to embracing and mastering emerging technologies. I'm excited to contribute my expertise, passion and dedication to create exceptional user experiences for startups and small businesses.
paragraphs.006: Got a question, or just want to say hello? Hit me up! Have a proposal, or project in mind? Let's collaborate!

biography.subheadline: Born in 1997. Raised in a small town in Philippines.

001.name: Operator Portal
001.description: Asset Management and Monitoring System for Seaplane Group management, and its partner operators

002.name: Mile High Roller Club
002.description: A collection of non-fungible tokens built on the ethereum network. It's the official loyalty program of Seaplane Group. It consists of five (5) NFT tiers: Voyager, Silver, Gold, Diamond and Platinum, with each tier offering different real-life utility values

003.name: APTI
003.description: Business website with Content Management System for Accel Prime Technologies, a computer parts retailer based in the Philippines.

004.name: PNP-eDPCR
004.description: Report Management System for the Philippine National Police - Directorate for Police Community Relations

005.name: Manda HIS
005.description: Hospital Information System for a government-controlled hospital in Mandaluyong, Philippines

006.name: DGCondo
006.description: Condominium Management System for DGCondo, a real estate operator based in the Philippines

007.name: PNP-LMS
007.description: Learning Management System for the Philippine National Police
